alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 17 at 8:05AM MST until June 18 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT /9 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Deserts. In Nevada, Sheep Range, Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon, Las Vegas Valley and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...From 8 AM PDT/MST this morning to 9 PM PDT/MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Pockets of blowing dust could impact travel on sections of Interstate 15.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
